page.title: 14CHILDREN'S GAMES CHELMARSH
page.content: I sometimes play games with my friend.We play things like bull dog and stampede.These games are played on the playground and you have to get from one end to the other without getting caught by the person who is on. We play tennis with the tennis rackets and a ball and these are supplied by the school. We have got 6 swings and a slide on our school playing field.It is not the school's all the time because it is rented off the Parish council. We have got a tree where children play dens in. Children do lots of running on the running track.We also play football,netball,rounders, cricket and cross country running.
